de.engehausen.treemap.examples

Class Messages

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.examples.Messages

  • public class Messages
extends java.lang.Object
    Message helper to display UI information in various languages.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
      Checks if the given key exists in the underlying bundles object.
      static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
      Returns a string for the given key in the currently active language or an appropriate fall back string.

    • Method Detail

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Returns a string for the given key in the currently active language or an appropriate fall back string.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for the value to look up, must not be null.
        Returns:
        the language string, or "!!" if none can be found

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
        Checks if the given key exists in the underlying bundles object.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to check; must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the key exists, false otherwise.
